name: Castle
headline: Block bots & bad behavior
description: Instantly stop automated and human-originated account takeovers, fake accounts, and any behavior that violates your platform policies.

#  Defend against bots, fraud, and abuse. 
Castle lets you block bad bots, account takeovers, transaction fraud, and spam. All without the hassle of CAPTCHAs. 
[ Start for free ](https://castle.io/<https:/dashboard.castle.io/signup/new>)
[![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/atlassian.svg)](https://castle.io/<https:/www.atlassian.com/>)
[![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/rockstar.svg)](https://castle.io/<https:/www.rockstargames.com/>)
[![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/ynab.svg)](https://castle.io/<https:/www.ynab.com/>)
[![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/litmus.svg)](https://castle.io/<https:/www.litmus.com/>)
[ ![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/renttherunway.svg) ](https://castle.io/<https:/www.renttherunway.com/>)
[![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/canva.svg)](https://castle.io/<https:/www.canva.com/>)
[![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/wonolo.svg)](https://castle.io/<https:/www.wonolo.com/>)
[ ![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/goto.svg) ](https://castle.io/<https:/www.goto.com/>)
[![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/novo.svg)](https://castle.io/<https:/www.novo.co/>)
[![](https://castle.io/assets/img/logos/dailypay.svg)](https://castle.io/<https:/www.dailypay.com/>)
#  Invisibly shield your accounts from threats 
Go beyond CAPTCHAs with a lightweight API that blocks large-scale human and bot-driven attacks using user identity, reputation, and behavior analysis. 
  * ###  Lightweight integration 
Integrate Castle as easily as adding a CAPTCHA without routing all web traffic through a CDN. 
  * ###  Complete protection 
Prevent large-scale attacks, detecting both human and bot-driven account takeovers and fake signups. 
  * ###  No CAPTCHAs needed 
Leveraging user identity, reputation, and behavior, Castle blocks attackers without CAPTCHAs that can tip them off. 


![](https://castle.io/assets/img/grid-glow.png)
Sign up 
Email
Password
Sign up

Continue
Verification failed 
73
Castle Risk Score 
  * Robotic input

  * Residential proxy 
  * No internet history 
  * Newly registered domain 


The Castle platform 
##  Everything you need to stop fraud & abuse 
A complete stack of data, tools, and APIs, eliminating the need for multiple, disconnected tools. 
  * [ ](https://castle.io/<https:/docs.castle.io/docs/metrics>)
### Behavioral analysis
Use out-of-the-box signals or create your own custom aggregations and rate limiters.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/behavioral-analysis.png)
  * [ ](https://castle.io/<https:/docs.castle.io/docs/device-fingerprinting>)
### Device fingerprinting
99.5% accurate fingerprinting. Uncover headless browsers, tampering, carrier data, etc.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/device-fingerprinting.png)
  * [ ](https://castle.io/<https:/docs.castle.io/docs/risk-scoring>)
### Bot detection
Detect bots, scripts, and coordinated attacks. Identify automated behavior and tampering.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/bot-detection.png)
  * [ ](https://castle.io/<https:/docs.castle.io/docs/risk-scoring>)
### AI scoring
Spot account takeover attempts and abusive behavior using self-learning AI.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/ai-scoring.png)
  * [ ](https://castle.io/<https:/docs.castle.io/docs/creating-a-policy>)
### Rules engine
Real-time allow, challenge, or deny actions. Manage rules seamlessly, without code changes.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/rules-engine.png)
  * [ ](https://castle.io/<https:/docs.castle.io/changelog/email-intelligence-monitor-domain-registration-dates>)
### Email intelligence
Assess email reputation and risk. Detect disposable domains and enumeration patterns.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/email-intelligence.png)
  * [ ](https://castle.io/<https:/docs.castle.io/docs/lists>)
### Case & state management
Manage dynamic trust, block, and review lists of users, devices, or any custom attribute.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/case-management.png)


![](https://castle.io/assets/img/use-cases/reflection.png)
Analytics
#  Proactive threat hunting with user behavior analytics 
Monitor, analyze, and alert on up to 18 months of historical data enriched with user and device intelligence to stop evolving abuse trends. 
Network analysis  Spot network of bad user activity via shared devices, emails, IPs, payment methods, or addresses.  Pattern exploration  Uncover bad user activity by querying and visualizing large amounts data and turn into rules with a few clicks.  Session monitoring Get a complete history of each user and company, down to individual page views and any custom actions.  Rule backtesting Test complex risk logic on historical data first, ensuring zero disruption to legitimate users. 
###  Pattern exploration 
Uncover patterns in login attacks, signup spam campaigns, and repetitive in-app transactions. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/network-analysis.png)
###  Network analysis 
Spot interconnected users via shared devices, emails, IPs, payment methods, or addresses. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/pattern-exploration.png)
###  Session monitoring 
Get a complete history of each user and company, down to individual page views and any custom actions. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/session-monitoring.png)
###  Rule simulation 
Test complex risk logic on historical data first, ensuring zero disruption to legitimate users. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/rule-backtesting.png)
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/network-analysis.png)
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/pattern-exploration.png)
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/session-monitoring.png)
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/rule-backtesting.png)
Customization 
##  Fraudulent behavior, as defined by you 
Combine Castle's threat data with velocity checks and rate limiters to categorize users according to what's considered fraud and abuse on your specific platform.

Automation
#  Scale threat response with custom flows 
Model custom security flows, blocklists, and trusted device management. Manage review states across signups, logins, and in-app activity. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/use-cases/account-takeover/automation.svg)
### State management
Maintain custom security lists (blocklists, allowlists, trusted devices, reviews, etc.) and update states in real-time based on rules and manual actions. 
### Inline blocking
Initiate real-time blocks or step-up verifications anywhere in your app without disrupting the user experience. 
###  Alerts & notifications 
Ensure your team stay informed with triggered Slack notifications, or automate end-user notifications or internal processes using granular webhooks. 
Developers 
##  Stop any fraud with a single, unified API 
Retrieve comprehensive threat insights in real-time and use them to tailor the user experience. 
Device Intelligence 
99.5% accurate fingerprinting. Uncover headless browsers, tampering, carrier data, etc. 
[ Read more ](https://castle.io/</product/devices>)
Bot Detection 
Detect bots, scripts, and coordinated attacks. Identify automated behavior and tampering. 
ATO & Abuse Scoring 
Spot account takeover attempts and abusive behavior using machine learning. 
IP & Proxy Analysis 
Unmask anonymizers, Tor, and suspicious IP origins. Protect against location-based abuse. 
Email Intelligence 
Assess email reputation and risk. Detect disposable domains, leaks, and enumeration patterns. 
Custom Metrics 
Tailor your own real-time aggregations based on login attempts, transactions, custom events, and more. 
Custom Alerts 
Define precise signals for proactive threat detection. Trigger alerts based on complex logic and risk thresholds. 
Rule Evaluation 
Automate allow, challenge, or deny actions. Manage rules seamlessly, without code changes. 
State Management 
Manage dynamic security lists. Track trusted/blocked devices, users, IPs, or any custom attribute. 
Response

egesgesges 
### Built for scale
Our APIs process billions of monthly requests with resilience against severe bot attacks. 
###  100ms response time 
Fingerprinting, risk scores, and rules computed instantly in real-time. 
###  Pay-as-you-go pricing 
Transparent and predictable plans based on requests or MAU. 
Get started

Starting at $0 for 1,000 requests per month, with transparent pricing that scales with your needs.

#  Defend against bots, fraud, and abuse. 
Castle lets you block bad bots, account takeovers, transaction fraud, and spam. All without the hassle of CAPTCHAs. 
 Start for free ⟨25⟩

#  Invisibly shield your accounts from threats 
Go beyond CAPTCHAs with a lightweight API that blocks large-scale human and bot-driven attacks using user identity, reputation, and behavior analysis. 
  * ###  Lightweight integration 
Integrate Castle as easily as adding a CAPTCHA without routing all web traffic through a CDN. 
  * ###  Complete protection 
Prevent large-scale attacks, detecting both human and bot-driven account takeovers and fake signups. 
  * ###  No CAPTCHAs needed 
Leveraging user identity, reputation, and behavior, Castle blocks attackers without CAPTCHAs that can tip them off.

The Castle platform 
##  Everything you need to stop fraud & abuse 
A complete stack of data, tools, and APIs, eliminating the need for multiple, disconnected tools. 
  *  ⟨36⟩
### Behavioral analysis
Use out-of-the-box signals or create your own custom aggregations and rate limiters.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/behavioral-analysis.png)
  *  ⟨37⟩
### Device fingerprinting
99.5% accurate fingerprinting. Uncover headless browsers, tampering, carrier data, etc.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/device-fingerprinting.png)
  *  ⟨38⟩
### Bot detection
Detect bots, scripts, and coordinated attacks. Identify automated behavior and tampering.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/bot-detection.png)
  *  ⟨38⟩
### AI scoring
Spot account takeover attempts and abusive behavior using self-learning AI.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/ai-scoring.png)
  *  ⟨39⟩
### Rules engine
Real-time allow, challenge, or deny actions. Manage rules seamlessly, without code changes.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/rules-engine.png)
  *  ⟨40⟩
### Email intelligence
Assess email reputation and risk. Detect disposable domains and enumeration patterns.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/email-intelligence.png)
  *  ⟨41⟩
### Case & state management
Manage dynamic trust, block, and review lists of users, devices, or any custom attribute.
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/home/features/case-management.png)


![](https://castle.io/assets/img/use-cases/reflection.png)
Analytics
#  Proactive threat hunting with user behavior analytics 
Monitor, analyze, and alert on up to 18 months of historical data enriched with user and device intelligence to stop evolving abuse trends. 
Network analysis  Spot network of bad user activity via shared devices, emails, IPs, payment methods, or addresses.  Pattern exploration  Uncover bad user activity by querying and visualizing large amounts data and turn into rules with a few clicks.  Session monitoring Get a complete history of each user and company, down to individual page views and any custom actions.  Rule backtesting Test complex risk logic on historical data first, ensuring zero disruption to legitimate users. 
###  Pattern exploration 
Uncover patterns in login attacks, signup spam campaigns, and repetitive in-app transactions. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/network-analysis.png)
###  Network analysis 
Spot interconnected users via shared devices, emails, IPs, payment methods, or addresses. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/pattern-exploration.png)
###  Session monitoring 
Get a complete history of each user and company, down to individual page views and any custom actions. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/session-monitoring.png)
###  Rule simulation 
Test complex risk logic on historical data first, ensuring zero disruption to legitimate users. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/rule-backtesting.png)
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/network-analysis.png)
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/pattern-exploration.png)
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/session-monitoring.png)
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/analytics/rule-backtesting.png)

Combine Castle's threat data with velocity checks and rate limiters to categorize users according to what's considered fraud and abuse on your specific platform.

Automation
#  Scale threat response with custom flows 
Model custom security flows, blocklists, and trusted device management. Manage review states across signups, logins, and in-app activity. 
![](https://castle.io/assets/img/use-cases/account-takeover/automation.svg)
### State management
Maintain custom security lists (blocklists, allowlists, trusted devices, reviews, etc.) and update states in real-time based on rules and manual actions. 
### Inline blocking
Initiate real-time blocks or step-up verifications anywhere in your app without disrupting the user experience. 
###  Alerts & notifications 
Ensure your team stay informed with triggered Slack notifications, or automate end-user notifications or internal processes using granular webhooks. 
Developers 
##  Stop any fraud with a single, unified API 
Retrieve comprehensive threat insights in real-time and use them to tailor the user experience. 
Device Intelligence 
99.5% accurate fingerprinting. Uncover headless browsers, tampering, carrier data, etc. 
 Read more ⟨42⟩
Bot Detection 
Detect bots, scripts, and coordinated attacks. Identify automated behavior and tampering. 
ATO & Abuse Scoring 
Spot account takeover attempts and abusive behavior using machine learning. 
IP & Proxy Analysis 
Unmask anonymizers, Tor, and suspicious IP origins. Protect against location-based abuse. 
Email Intelligence 
Assess email reputation and risk. Detect disposable domains, leaks, and enumeration patterns. 
Custom Metrics 
Tailor your own real-time aggregations based on login attempts, transactions, custom events, and more. 
Custom Alerts 
Define precise signals for proactive threat detection. Trigger alerts based on complex logic and risk thresholds. 
Rule Evaluation 
Automate allow, challenge, or deny actions. Manage rules seamlessly, without code changes. 
State Management 
Manage dynamic security lists. Track trusted/blocked devices, users, IPs, or any custom attribute.

generated_description:
### Castle: Defending Your Platform Against Bots and Bad Behavior

**Overview**  
Castle is a security company based in San Francisco, focused on eliminating automated and human-driven fraudulent activities across digital platforms. Founded as part of the Y Combinator Batch W16, Castle aims to “block bots and bad behavior,” ensuring that online services remain safe and user-friendly.

**Mission**  
The mission of Castle is clear: to empower businesses by preventing account takeovers, blocking fake accounts, and managing any behavior that violates platform policies. Its solutions allow companies to defend against a variety of threats without relying on cumbersome CAPTCHA systems.

**Product Features**  
Castle offers a comprehensive suite of tools tailored for fraud detection and abuse prevention, which includes:

- **Velocity-Based Rules**: Apply real-time, dynamic rules to manage user behavior.
- **Device Fingerprinting**: Identify unique user devices to detect fraud with 99.5% accuracy.
- **User Behavior Analytics**: Gain deep insights into how users interact with your platform and spot anomalies.
- **Risk Scoring**: Utilize customized scoring systems to assess the threat level of different users.

**Use Cases**  
Castle’s tools cater to several significant challenges:

- **Fake Accounts**: Easily identify and remove malicious accounts.
- **Account Takeovers**: Proactively detect both automated and manual attempts to hijack accounts.
- **Content Abuse**: Block spam and repetitive content submissions.
- **Transaction Fraud**: Stop credit card testing and fraudulent transactions.

**Team and Growth**  
With a growing team of 20 employees, Castle leverages its expertise in security and software development to provide scalable solutions that monitor hundreds of millions of user interactions monthly. Their services are built for high performance, boasting a response time of approximately 100ms.

**Customer Base**  
Castle has catered to renowned names like Atlassian, Rockstar Games, and Canva, showcasing its robust capabilities in securing diverse digital platforms.

**Getting Started**  
For businesses looking to bolster their defenses against fraud, Castle offers a transparent pricing model that starts at $0 for the first 1,000 requests per month. This makes it accessible for small startups and large enterprises alike.

**Final Thoughts**  
Castle stands at the forefront of cybersecurity, providing a seamless way for online platforms to protect themselves from evolving threats while enhancing user experience. Their commitment to innovation and security signifies a forward-thinking approach in an increasingly digital world.

To learn more about Castle and their offerings, visit [Castle.io](https://castle.io/).
